guiSET.core

Class HScrollContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.Container
        • guiSET.core.HFlowContainer
          • guiSET.core.HScrollContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Textbox

    public class HScrollContainer
extends HFlowContainer
    A Container that layouts its content horizontally and enables a scrollbar if the content overflows.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen
